attributes.action: Transfer all speed cameras to be installed as red light safety cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speed or so called safety cameras do nothing for genuine road safety, they just produce revenue for the authority installing them
I propose to move all of these cameras to light controlled junctions & crossings, where they would contribute to a real reduction in accidents & significantly reduce the strain on an already stretched health service.
